org.jirduino.drivers

Class IRLib2Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jirduino.drivers.IRLib2Device
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRDevice

    public class IRLib2Device
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRDevice
    Java IRLib2 Driver for jIRDuino. This class works with IRDuino-IRLib2 Sketch sketch based Cyborg5's library (https://github.com/cyborg5/IRLib2)
    Author:
    Emanuele Paiano

        Description copied from interface: IRDevice

      • receiveData

        public Signal receiveData()
        Description copied from interface: IRDevice

        Returns:
        [ProtocolID, HexValue] as Item
